Item: Are all work and storage areas kept clean and free of debris and waste throughout the workday
Are exist and entrance ways kept unobstructed, clean and dry
Do spills get cleaned up quickly and properly
Is the  DU room  kept  clean
Are waste bins & sharp container  cleared when 3/4 full
Are bathrooms clean properly  and kept dry
All patients care utilities are disinfected as per cleaning protocol
Are blood and body fluids spilled linens soaked in sodium hypochlorite
Is the unit cleaned at the defined frequency
The dilutions of the cleaning agent used for floor is as per the recommendation
High touch areas cleaned at the defined frequency
Equipment cleaned at the defined frequency
The agent used for equipment disinfection is as per recommendation
Adequate hand washing facilities are available
Is equipment stored in designated areas when not in use
Staff wear PPE  when and where required
Are all chemicals labelled and stored in appropriate location
Staff are aware of MSDS
Are all tools and equipment used for cleaning (e.g. mop, duster etc.) are labelled and kept in proper location
Staff has been trained in general housekeeping practices and SOPs
Hand washing compliance
Are all  staff aware about Bio medical waste disposal guidelines
Are all disinfectants used are diluted as per dilution protocol
